sentences.en: Andrew now came almost weekly to call.
sentences.cn: 现在安德鲁几乎每星期都来。

sentences.en: Average weekly cinema attendance in February was 2.41 million.
sentences.cn: 2月份，平均每周的观影人数为241万。

sentences.en: Average weekly earnings rose by 1.5% in July.
Each course comprises 10-12 informal weekly meetings.
sentences.cn: 每门课程都包括10至12次每周一次的非正式讨论会。

sentences.en: He lived on an invalidity pension which came as a weekly giro.
sentences.cn: 他靠每周领取的作为病残养老金的直接转账救济支票过日子。

sentences.en: I ghosted his weekly rugby column for the Telegraph.
sentences.cn: 我为他代写《电讯报》每周的橄榄球专栏。

sentences.en: In addition to my weekly wage, I got a lot of tips.
sentences.cn: 除了每周的薪水外，我还能得到不少小费。

sentences.en: Next week they will swap places and will repeat the switch weekly.
sentences.cn: 下周他们将交换座位，并且以后每周换一次。

sentences.en: The group meets on a regular basis, usually weekly or biweekly.
sentences.cn: 这个小组定期会面，通常是每周或每两周一次。
这个小组每周见一次面。

sentences.en: The menu changes weekly and usually includes a vegan option.
sentences.cn: 菜单每周都有变化，通常包含可供严格的素食者选择的菜肴。

sentences.en: The newspaper came out weekly. It satirized political leaders.
sentences.cn: 该报纸每周一期，讽刺各位政治领导人。

sentences.en: The Tundra Times, a weekly newspaper in Alaska, ceased publication this week.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加的周报《苔原时报》本周停刊了。

sentences.en: You can be paid in cash weekly or by cheque monthly; those are the two alternatives.
sentences.cn: 你的工资可以按周以现金支取，或按月以支票支取。二者可选其一。

words.tran_cn: 持续一星期的；为时一周的
为时一周；在一个星期中

phrases.tran_cn: 娱乐周刊；娱乐周报；每周娱乐

trans.tran_en: a magazine that appears once a week
